meanings.sent1: The rainy weather disinclines me from going outside.
meanings.sent2: His fear of heights disinclines him from trying bungee jumping.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating broccoli disinclines the child from finishing his dinner.
meanings.sent4: The constant criticism disinclines her from pursuing her passion for painting.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise of the construction site disinclines the birds from nesting nearby.

meanings.sent1: The warning signs disincline hikers from entering the restricted area.
meanings.sent2: The high cost of the trip disinclines many people from traveling abroad.
meanings.sent3: The terrible reviews disincline customers from trying the new restaurant.
meanings.sent4: The challenging nature of the task disinclines him from taking on additional responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The lack of support disinclines students from participating in extracurricular activities.
